content: The November 2022 release of Visual Studio Code includes several updates and improvements, such as the ability to customize the auto-reveal behavior of the Explorer, hide badges on the Activity bar and Panel, and use audio cues in notebooks and diff view. The release also adds new features for managing unsafe repositories, creating CPU profiles for JavaScript, and debugging Jupyter notebooks. Other updates include support for remote tunnels, GPU access in Dev Containers, and improved accessibility features.
